scripts.dev: concurrently "cd app && yarn dev" "cd server && yarn dev"
scripts.clean:all: (rm -rf -rf node_modules) && (cd app && rm -rf -rf node_modules) && (cd server && rm -rf node_modules)
scripts.prisma:generate: npx prisma generate --schema server/prisma/network_traffic_schema.prisma ; npx prisma generate --schema server/prisma/configs_schema.prisma
